item.title: Make Mine Green Hosting
item.description:
Two major challenges impacting data centers today are power demands and the associated costs, limiting the expansion of online services. Large server farms are often located not for staff convenience, but near ample power sources due to their significant energy consumption. Information technology requires vast amounts of electricity, particularly for processing large datasets at high speeds. Servers generate significant heat, demanding substantial cooling systems, which further increase energy consumption. Data centers, with their massive energy needs, face challenges as we grapple with power generation limitations...
